sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"起源，源自"之意。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin originat- 'caused to begin', from Latin origo, origin- 'source, origin'

entry.tran: 发源；来自；产生；创始；开创
entry.def: When something originates or when someone originates it, it begins to happen or exist.

example.tran: 所有的碳水化合物均来自植物。

means.word_mean: 1. come into existence; take on form or shape;

sentences.sentence: "A new religious movement originated in that country"
"a love that sprang up from friendship"
"the idea for the book grew out of a short story"

means.word_mean: 3. begin a trip at a certain point, as of a plane, train, bus, etc.;

stems_affixes.word_buile: origin[n.起源,由来;出身,来历]+al……的→adj.最初的,原文的;新颖的 n.原物,原作,原文
ab加强+origin起源+al……的→起源而来→原始的
original最初的+ly表副词→adv.最初, 原先
orig升起,开始+in→生命开始→起源
origin[n.起源,由来;出身,来历]+al……的→adj.最初的,原文的;新颖的 n.原物,原作,原文
origin起源+ate表动词→v.[in,from]起源,发生;首创,创造
